kind: CustomResourceDefinition
metadata:
  name: children.sample.fabric8.io
spec:
  group: sample.fabric8.io
  names:
    kind: Child
    plural: children
    singular: child
  scope: Namespaced
  subresources:
    status: {}
  validation:
    openAPIV3Schema:
      properties:
        spec:
          properties:
            baseInt:
              type: integer
            supported:
              additionalProperties:
                type: string
              type: object
            unsupported:
              additionalProperties:
                type: object
              type: object
            unsupported2:
              additionalProperties:
                type: object
              type: object
          type: object
        status:
          type: object
      type: object

    served: true
